name: Feral Attraction
description:
Welcome to Feral Attraction! A Visual Novel where you talk to and romance cute little furry characters! In this Dating Sim, you play as your everyday ordinary stereotypical college kid who has just moved into the dorms. The goal is to make yourself likeable enough to the point where the actual interesting cast wants to kiss you. Who will you try to go after? 

Lika? (Sly vixen)

Gerard? (Your roommate)

Doki? (The correct choice)

Popcorn? (a tiny man.)

Koey? (The wrong choice)

Miyah? (Very shy and purple)

Explore each and every character's isolated storylines, with thousands of lines of dialogue and thousands of lines of tears that fell from my face while writing it.

You can get a taste of every character's story, but in the end, you must only pick one to be with!
